review_data.title: Simple, fast lunch buffet
review_data.content: Lunch buffet with warm and cold options. Pay by weight of plate. Not great for vegetarians, but some nice cold salad options. Small place, so better to takeaway.

review_data.title: A cheap, basic meal in the Niederdorf

review_data.title: Delicious bratwurst of pornographic proportions
review_data.content: A kind of deli with a few informal tables with mostly very friendly service. Finally a reasonably-priced option. We had the grilled bratwurst with the rosti (roasted potatoes) and purple cabbage for 12 Swiss francs/plate, which was by far the cheapest option we had in...More

review_data.title: Salchicha
review_data.content: This place offers delicious classics. To balance our food budget, we had a few dinners here - very tasty and by Zurich standards, very inexpensive.

review_data.title: Great Swiss Take-Out Food!
review_data.content: While walking around Zurich on Stussihofstatt, and observing the many restaurant menus, we couldn't make up our mind. So we decided to order take-out from the Metzgerei Z'graggen. We ordered pork schnitzel, chicken schnitzel, venison in gravy, cheese pasta, and rice. All of the food...More
